alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 7:12PM MDT until October 02 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL CUSTER AND NORTHEASTERN FALL RIVER COUNTIES... At 712 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Pringle to 2 miles southwest of Angostura Reservoir, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs, Custer, Oral, Buffalo Gap, Smithwick, northern Angostura Reservoir, Black Hills Playhouse, Buffalo Corrals, Mount Coolidge and Cold Brook Reservoir. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
